projects.title: SOS Emergency App
description: Developed and launched an SOS emergency feature on Fitbit that instantly notifies preset contacts with real-time user coordinates using GPS in 1 to 1.5 seconds.
Developed a location-tracking feature for Versa 3 using JavaScript in Fitbit Studio, connecting to mobile devices and sending real-time coordinates to a NodeJS backend server.
Designed and deployed a NodeJS server to interface with Fitbit devices, processing data and triggering emergency messages to pre-defined contacts.

projects.title: Speech Processing and Analysis
description: Developed a Deep Neural Network using the classification algorithm to analyze speech data for Gender Identification (78%) and Speaker Recognition (45%) through data processing and visualization.
Engineered a speech processing pipeline that incorporated feature extraction techniques and noise reduction algorithms, achieving a 30% improvement in speech recognition accuracy.
Implemented a real-time voice activity detection system utilizing signal processing techniques, which reduced false detections by 25% and enhanced overall system reliability.

projects.title: Anduno Sense - Wireless Sensor Hub
description: Automated electronic component control through an Android app interfaced with light sensors and AGPS using Bluetooth on an Arduino board, optimizing automation effectiveness.

Developed Anduno Sense â€“ a wireless sensor hub integrating light sensors, AGPS, and Bluetooth, seamlessly controlled via an Android app, which enhanced automation efficiency and reduced manual intervention by 40%.
Created an application for Android OS 2.2 and above for managing devices connected to Anduno Sense using Java, resulting in a user-friendly interface.
